p: The many risks to the wellbeing of HCWs are not well understood. Post-SARS, there has been some research into this area but little is known about the psychological impact during infectious disease outbreaks ( Mak et al., 2009). Detrimental outcomes such as burnout, traumatic stress, anxiety, and depressive symptoms have been reported even after an outbreak, suggesting long-term implications ( Lancee et al., 2008). Given the likely increased rate of psychological problems amongst HCWs, these factors must be addressed.
